thread.title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend's Marrakech Pics Are Actual Family Vacation Goals
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend's Marrakech Pics Are Actual Family Vacation Goals

title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend's Marrakech Pics Are Actual Family Vacation Goals
text:
Chrissy Teigen and John Legend's Marrakech Pics Are Actual Family Vacation Goals By PHOTO: Instagram/ @chrissyteigen 
Chrissy Teigen , John Legend , and little Luna have been living it up on a family vacation in Marrakech—or, shall we say "extended family," because hairstylist/BFF Jen Atkin and photographer Mike Rosenthal came with. They basically brought us along, too, because the family documented the whole thing on Instagram and Snapchat (per usual), and we gotta say, we're this close to buying plane tickets. 
It's not the first time Teigen and Legend have headed to Morocco on vacation—they went two years ago for Legend's birthday. But it's the first trip for Luna, and it looks like the vacation was just as delightful for her as it was for the grown-ups. 
Below, see all of the photos of their family trip: 
Here's Teigen and Luna exploring the souks. Loading 
Teigen really let her hair out down, bringing just one extension with her, to Atkins' incredulity... Loading 
...but still got her hair done. Loading 
Real talk: Riads are gorgeous. Loading 
The boys played with reptiles, and Teigen didn't really understand why. Loading 
Obviously a Moroccan vacation with Teigen wouldn't be a vacation at all without some delicious food. Loading 
We would gladly eat these leftovers. Loading 
Luna also got in some "light reading"... Loading 
...and pulled a face with her dad. Loading 
She also tested out a rug. Loading 
Unfortunately, it seems, some rare rain spoiled some of the family's fun. (Stars: They're just like us and also have technical difficulties at super inconvenient times). Loading
